## BaseCameraController.onMouseWheel() method

Handle mouse wheel (scroll) events.

Typical usage: zoom/dolly control, FOV adjustments.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onMouseWheel(evt: IControllerWheelEvent): boolean;
```
